lead_paragraph: The following is an extract from a letter just received from a gentleman of intelligence and familiar acquaintance with Havana: "A friend from Havana, I regret to say, assured me that the old accounts of personal indignities practised upon the dead bodies of the 16th August, are not without foundation.
